refnamediv.refpurpose: export samba stats as prometheus metrics

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This tool is part of the samba 1 suite.

samba-prometheus-exporter is a Python utility for exporting smbd internal stats and profile-counters as Prometheus metrics. It converts 'smbstatus' JSON output into Prometheus metrics format over HTTP. When Samba is compiled and run with profiling enabled it is also possible to export profile information as metrics.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: The original Samba software and related utilities were created by Andrew Tridgell. Samba is now developed by the Samba Team as an Open Source project similar to the way the Linux kernel is developed.
